results.title: Metamorphosis: TM
results.brief_description: A colour 2D computer animation in response to the project theme of metamorphosis. A visual poem that puns on the meaning of metamorphosis…time atomises this poem. (No credits available).
results.description: A colour 2D computer animation in response to the project theme of metamorphosis. A visual poem that puns on the meaning of metamorphosis…time atomises this poem. (No credits available).

results.title: RMIT AIM Collection 1994
results.brief_description:
Compilation of student work from the University of RMIT Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) Department. 1994.
The Centre for Animation and Interactive Media, its courses, facilities, staff and collection of work was transferred from Swinburne University of Technology to RMIT University in 1995.

results.title: [The Fridge]
results.brief_description: An ant attempts to climb to the top of the family fridge. As he scales towards the summit - dressed in his mountain climbing gear - an accident prevents him from achieving his goal. His tragic downfall is captured by photographers.
results.description: An ant attempts to climb to the top of the family fridge. As he scales towards the summit - dressed in his mountain climbing gear - an accident prevents him from achieving his goal. His tragic downfall is captured by photographers.

results.title: Faith the fax
results.brief_description: A platypus and his mate discuss the advantages of communicating with God. The platypus convinces his friend that forecasts from God via fax are essential for averting danger.
